title: New Quad Lock Stem Mounts
content:
Quad Lock, makers of super secure phone mounts for all sorts of vehicles just announced an all-new Stem Mount system for bikes that mounts under your stem cap…

Save space in your bicycle’s cockpit with our Quad Lock® Stem Cap Mount or Quad Lock® Stem Cap Mount Adjustable. Both securely install between your bicycle’s stem and stem cap, offering compatibility with a large variety of stem angles.

SECURE MOUNTING

Forged by aircraft-grade aluminum then heat-treated, the Stem Cap Mounts have been rigorously tested and built for optimal strength. Both mounts come with our patented dual-stage lock, which allows you to ride with confidence knowing that your smartphone will stay secure on your bike, no matter the terrain.

SLEEK DESIGN

Made by premium materials, aircraft-grade CNC-machined aluminum, with black hardware and a short black lever, for a minimal and lightweight aesthetic. Our Stem Cap Mounts install securely between your bike’s stem and stem cap.

OPTIMAL VIEWING POSITION

Both mounts feature a dual-sided head design, allowing you to mount the lever head on either side, offering more flexibility in adjusting your optimal phone viewing position on a variety of stem angles.

The Stem Cap Mount Adjustable features a screw-tightened hinge to hold firmly in place in your preferred viewing angle.

QUICK TO ATTACH / DETACH

Simply twist and lock to view apps as you ride such as Ride with GPS®, Strava®, or maps. Detach just as easily so you don’t miss a photo opportunity or important call.

Check out more at Quadlock!
